feed.title: Data Driven PSE @ GT ChBE
feed.subtitle: Find out recent news from the Data-Driven Process Systems Engineering (DDPSE) Lab at Georgia Tech School of Chemical & Biomolecular Engineering in Atlanta.

entry.title: Sidharth Laxminarayan awarded Amyn S. Teja International Endowment Fund

link.title: Sidharth Laxminarayan awarded Amyn S. Teja International Endowment Fund

entry.content: Sid Laxminarayan is the recipient of the 2024 Amyn S. Teja International Endowment Fund, which will allow him to travel to Imperial College London to work with our international collaborators in the area of bioprocess modeling and control.
entry.summary: Sid Laxminarayan is the recipient of the 2024 Amyn S. Teja International Endowment Fund, which will allow him to travel to Imperial College London to work with our international collaborators in the area of bioprocess modeling and control.
